description:
Ordinarily, in Games Workshop's Warhammer 40k universe, it's the stuffy, hypocritical, bureaucratic human Imperium that gets tied up in paperwork, while the cool, rebellious Chaos folks just roam about killing people, conducting foul eldritch rituals, and generally doing as they please. This ingenious little pamphlet, cooked up as an April Fool's Day 2025 joke by a TTRPG homebrewer, flips the script, asking: what if the followers of Chaos had to do admin?

Continue reading The Depart
title: The Departmento of Chaos Efficiency is the best Warhammer 40k April Fool in ages

description:
As of April 1, board game designer and publisher CMON has frozen all trading of its shares on the Hong Kong stock exchange. CMON has yet to publish its financial report for the year ending December 2024, and can’t trade on the exchange until it does - but legal complications of an earlier deal may stand in the way.

Continue reading Why are board game giant CMON’s shares suddenly frozen?
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games , Co
title: Why are board game giant CMON’s shares suddenly frozen?

description:
Not only is the Pokémon Obsidian Flames Charmander promo from the Elite Trainer Box a beautiful card, but it's also become a meme in the community. This frustrated Charmander looking outside at a group of free Pidgeys has become a staple for players and collectors alike, and as I look at the price of this PSA 10 Charmander promo, I’m suddenly starting to relate to the emotions depicted in the card.

Continue reading This free Pokémon card went for almost $2000 in a recent eBay auction
MORE FROM WARGAMER:
title: This free Pokémon card went for almost $2000 in a recent eBay auction

description:
When it comes to DMing, I’m the D&D equivalent of a doomsday prepper. Each session plan features three, four, or more possible scenarios that player choices could trigger. I’ve usually thought of everything. However, for the first time in our two-year campaign, my current Dungeons and Dragons party caught me off guard. It was glorious, and I hope it happens again.

Continue reading How to DM when your DnD party totally derails your plans
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review,
title: How to DM when your DnD party totally derails your plans

description:
In the space of one Adepticon presentation, Atomic Mass Games sent our hopes for Star Wars: Legion into hyperspace. The firm has outlined a packed schedule of new models, quality resculpts, and re-releases of out-of-production kits, all led by four incredibly priced starter sets that will be available by the fall this year. It’s the kind of transformative release line-up that could bring thousands of new players into the game.

Continue reading Star Wars Legion is back, baby, and 2025 is the perfect year to start
MORE FROM WARGAMER:
title: Star Wars Legion is back, baby, and 2025 is the perfect year to start

description:
Wizards of the Coast dropped a blinder of an April Fools surprise yesterday: a brand new Marvel Secret Lair featuring the fourth wall breaking superhero Deadpool. This selection of Universes Beyond MTG cards went on sale the same day as it was announced on April 1, 2025. Most shockingly of all, not only is this drop full of really cool cards, it’s actually still in stock, 18 hours later.

Continue reading MTG’s surprise Deadpool Secret Lair is still in stock and packed with good cards
title: MTG’s surprise Deadpool Secret Lair is still in stock and packed with good cards

description:
Is Warhammer 40k: Astartes 2 still coming out? Joyfully, the answer is yes! Back in 2021, Games Workshop hired expert animator Syama Pedersen, the creator of the original 2018 animated YouTube mini-series Astartes, to create a follow-up season for Warhammer Plus - and now, finally, that sequel is visible on the horizon. This guide tracks all the latest info, trailer, and the official release window for the animated mini-epic.

Continue reading Warhammer 40k Astartes 2 guide - release window, trailer, and easter eggs
title: Warhammer 40k Astartes 2 guide - release window, trailer, and easter eggs

description:
Who is Warhammer 40k's Rogal Dorn? The seventh primarch, lord of the Imperial Fists, the original Lord Commander of the Imperium, and redoubtable Praetorian of Terra during the Horus Heresy, sour-faced, ice-haired Rogal Dorn embodied a role of fierce protection over the Imperium’s most valuable treasures. Blessed with an almost innate understanding of battlefield tactics and defensive siegecraft, he helped ensure humanity’s survival in its darkest hour: the infamous Siege of Terra.

Continue reading Warhammer 40k Rogal Dorn - the complete guide
MORE FROM WARGAMER:
title: Warhammer 40k Rogal Dorn - the complete guide
